titleStmt.title: Anti-Mortonus or An apology in defence of the Church of Rome. Against the grand imposture of Doctor Thomas Morton, Bishop of Durham. Whereto is added in the chapter XXXIII. An answere to his late sermon printed, and preached before His Maiesty in the cathedrall church of the same citty..
titleStmt.author: Price, John, 1576-1645.

notesStmt.note: "The epistle dedicatory" signed at end: I.S. Attributed to John Price by Allison & Rogers.
Place of publication and publisher from Allison & Rogers; STC (2nd ed.).
"Errors in the print, to be corrected": [4] p. at end.
Imperfect: wanting all text after p. 754. Full collation and signatures of text from facsimile reprint in English Recusant Literature, v. 288. HRC has a bifolium at end not given in ERL.
Reproduction of original in: University of Texas at Austin. Library.
